ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm Change
ygData.msgSnippet: I think the exploit MIGHT be that you can use short duration charm to simply soften up two mobs and then kill both for full xp.  Seems to me a poor exploit
ygData.messageBody:
I think the exploit MIGHT be that you can use short duration charm to simply soften up two mobs and then kill both for full xp. Seems to me a poor exploit tho, especially since we pay for a 39th lvl charm with mana and that charm has no enhancements over song of sirens and the only benefit is that, we can continue to do something we've been doing for 12 lvls...

John Grady <john_grady@...> wrote:
That is ridiculous. I have no idea what exploit they are referring to. But
all this does is make it more likely I'm going to get carpal tunnel
syndrome working aroung this hindrance.

My lawyer will clean up the suit, but it will go something like; "You get
us addicted and then proceed to add enhancements that are progressively
debilitating" :)

Anyone know how to hotkey the F8 command?

Tzeetch, Xegony Minstrel
